name: PILOT FriXion Clicker Erasable Pens, Refillable & Retractable Gel Ink Pens, Fine Point 0.7 mm, Black Ink, 3-Pack - Ideal for School, Journaling, & Office Writing
short_description: PILOT FRIXION CLICKER: These FriXion Erasable Pens combine the ease of a retractable pen with Pilot's erasable thermo-sensitive gel ink. These are perfect for long study sessions, planner notes, or professional projects

WRITE & CREATE FEARLESSLY: If you love Pilot FriXion Pens, FriXion Erasable Gel Pens & markers, you'll want to try Pilot's full line of erasable Clickers, ColorSticks, Fineliners, Colors Marker Pens, & Highlighters

ERASABLE, RETRACTABLE, REFILLABLE: The Pilot FriXion Erasable Pens write smooth & erases clean. Available in a variety of vibrant ink colors: black, blue, red, turquoise, purple, navy, pink, & green. Loved by students, parents, & professionals alike
TRUSTED QUALITY: We've been making pens for over 100 years. Whether you're taking notes, stocking up on school or office supplies, or writing in a bullet journal, Pilot has the perfect pen for you!
POWER TO THE PEN: With FriXion, mistakes turn into opportunities. Erase, rewrite, and create without limits - making it the perfect study partner, journaling tool, and office essential

To erase, use a FriXion eraser. Note: Heat from erasing friction or other sources, will cause FriXion thermosensitive ink to become colorless at temperatures >140ºF. To restore color, cool to at least 14ºF in a freezer. FriXion is not recommended for use on legal or official documents.

Fine Point of these gel erasable pens is excellent for everyday office use. These pens for school are perfect for school supplies, journaling, planners, homework, office notes, & professional use. FriXion’s smooth, mistake-free writing is trusted by students, teachers, parents, professionals, and creatives alike. Compatible with FriXion Ball and FriXion Clicker Pens. FriXion is not recommended for use on legal or official documents.
